author: ealexjordan
body: Resolves Issue #921. ProcessRecord in GetChildrenCommand.cs was not receiving an absolute path from sym links for Get-ChildItem.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @ealexjordan can you add a regression test based on #921?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @ealexjordan I don't think you meant to push all these other commits.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Closing as expected windows behavior  in favor of opening new pull request for "Get-ChildItem of Symbolic Link Does Not Work Outside Parent Directory" #1263

title: Fix Get-ChildItem for Symbolic Links on Linux
